about_the_game:
On a typical night, an accident unexpectedly brings you to a goddess. You want to go back to your normal life and negotiate in many ways, but in the end, you become an "ISEKAI Truck Driver" !!

The job of a ISEKAI Truck Driver is to assist the goddess in transporting the specified target to the other world, when the other world is in turmoil and the goddess needs to summon heroes. And how do you transport them? By driving a truck enhanced by the goddess and hit the target!!

In the story, there are five goddesses from different worlds who need your assistance. As the tasks are completed, the communication between you and the goddesses will make your relationship closer. If you fulfill the goddesses' needs, you may even engage in deeper interactions with them?!

However, through contact with various goddesses, you slowly realize that this world seems different from what you imagined. Is there a way to return to your normal life?

content_descriptors.notes:
Character is over the age of 20.
Content Warning: "ISEKAI Truck Driver" content includes images and descriptions of sexual organs, sexual intercourse, oral sex etc.

detailed_description:
On a typical night, an accident unexpectedly brings you to a goddess. You want to go back to your normal life and negotiate in many ways, but in the end, you become an "ISEKAI Truck Driver" !!

The job of a ISEKAI Truck Driver is to assist the goddess in transporting the specified target to the other world, when the other world is in turmoil and the goddess needs to summon heroes. And how do you transport them? By driving a truck enhanced by the goddess and hit the target!!

In the story, there are five goddesses from different worlds who need your assistance. As the tasks are completed, the communication between you and the goddesses will make your relationship closer. If you fulfill the goddesses' needs, you may even engage in deeper interactions with them?!

However, through contact with various goddesses, you slowly realize that this world seems different from what you imagined. Is there a way to return to your normal life?
name: ISEKAI Truck Driver Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: "ISEKAI Truck Driver" is a game where you drive a truck through the city, constantly searching for targets and transporting them. Complete missions assigned by goddesses, and have closer relationships.
supported_languages: English, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
